title: Wanderer - Echoes of the Past
description: Freedom was only the start. The crew of the Wanderer face ever greater challenges as their journey continues. Knowing the Empire will hunt them down Jess and the others must seek help from another source.Turning to the criminal underworld seems like their only option, but it soon threatens to end in disaster. Especially when past events return to haunt the present.Will even the incredible Wanderer be enough to keep Jess, and those he cares about, safe?
author: Simon Goodson
